titleStmt.title: The raging Turke, or, Baiazet the Second A tragedie vvritten by Thomas Goffe, Master of Arts, and student of Christ-Church in Oxford, and acted by the students of the same house.
titleStmt.author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by August. Matthevves, for Richard Meighen,

notesStmt.note: Dedication heading, A2r, is in four lines. Variant: A2r is a paste-on cancel; text in same setting, but heading in six lines.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
